backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles and daily follower lists with access control checks for viewing and saving data.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files describing their roles and features.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining theme variables, dark mode values, and global background/text styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling authentication, profile setup flow, and rendering the notebook interface with optional follower wall.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Button controlling Internet Identity login/logout with status handling and cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: A dialog component that collects and submits a user's name during profile setup.
frontend/src/components/FollowerListEdit: Editor component for adding, editing, and removing follower names with inline controls.
frontend/src/components/FollowerWall.tsx: Background component rendering uniquely styled follower names in randomized positions.
frontend/src/components/LoadSaveStatus.t: Displays loading skeletons, error alerts, or saving indicators for follower data operations.
frontend/src/components/NotebookPage.tsx: Notebook page managing date-based follower lists, save actions, and unsaved-change warnings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDailyFollowers.ts: Hooks for fetching, saving, and aggregating daily follower lists using the backend actor with react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, login handling, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Hooks for fetching and updating the caller's user profile and role using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining a notebook-themed UI with light and dark palettes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that initializes React, react-query, and the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/utils/date.ts: Utility functions for formatting, normalizing, and retrieving ISO-formatted dates.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/src/vite-env.d.ts: Type declarations for Vite environment variables.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
